votebox.middle.ballot

Interface IBallotLookupAdapter


  • public interface IBallotLookupAdapter
    Use an instance of this interface to make queries on the ballot.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isCard

        boolean isCard(java.lang.String UID)
               throws UnknownUIDException
        Look up a UID in the ballot, and check if it is representative of a Card.
        Parameters:
        UID - Lookup this UID in the ballot.
        Returns:
        This method returns true if the given UID is a Card, false if it isn't.
        Throws:
        UnknownUIDException

      • selectedElement

        java.lang.String selectedElement(java.lang.String UID)
                                 throws NonCardException,
                                        CardException,
                                        UnknownUIDException
        Look up a card's selected element.
        Parameters:
        UID - Look up the card given by this UID
        Returns:
        This method returns the UID of the given card's currently selected element, or returns the UID of the card if no element on the card is selected.
        Throws:
        NonCardException - This method throws if the UID given is not representative of a card.
        CardException - This method throws if the Card encounters a problem when it tries to determine what the selected element is.
        UnknownUIDException - This method throws if the UID given does not exist in the ballot.

      • isSelected

        boolean isSelected(java.lang.String uid)
                   throws UnknownUIDException
        Call this method to check the state of an element.
        Parameters:
        uid - This is the uniqueid of the element whose state you wish to check.
        Returns:
        This method returns true if the element given is currently selected, or false if it is not.
        Throws:
        UnknownUIDException - This method throws an exception if the UID given as a parameter does not exist.

      • exists

        boolean exists(java.lang.String uid)
        Call this method to check that a particular UID exists.
        Parameters:
        uid - This is the UID you wish to check.
        Returns:
        This method returns true if the checked UID exists, or false if it does not.

      • getCastBallot

        ASExpression getCastBallot()
        Call this method to get the s-expression representation of the ballot.
        Returns:
        This method returns an s-expression representation of the ballot.

      • numSelections

        int numSelections()
        Call this method to get the number of selections that have currently been made in the target ballot. By "selections" here, we mean the number of card elements that belong to this ballot that have selections on them at the time of the method call (these selections cannot be "no selection").
        Returns:
        This method returns the number of selections that have been made on the ballot associated with this adapter.

      • getRaceGroups

        java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getRaceGroups()
        Call this method to determine the structure and contents of the various races in this ballot.
        Returns:
        a List of the groups of race-ids that make up each race. Used to construct NIZKs.

      • getAffectedRaces

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<ASExpression>> getAffectedRaces(java.util.List<java.lang.String> affectedUIDs)
        Returns:
        a Map of each affected race (UID) to its cast ballot form.

      • getRaceGroupContaining

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRaceGroupContaining(java.util.List<ASExpression> uids)
        Parameters:
        uids - - Cast ballot
        Returns:
        the racegroup this cast ballot corresponds to.
